on reading compounds: 認識【ニンシキ】recognition, awareness, perception, understanding, knowledge, cognition, cognizance, cognisance
認可【ニンカ】approval, license, licence, permission
公認【コウニン】official recognition, authorization, authorisation, licence, license, accreditation
kun reading compounds: 認める【みとめる】to recognize, to recognise, to observe, to notice, to deem, to judge, to assess, to approve, to deem acceptable, to allow, to admit, to accept, to confess (to a charge), to watch steadily, to observe carefully, to renown, to give renown to, to appreciate, to acknowledge
認める【したためる】to write (e.g. a letter), to draw up (a document), to take down (e.g. notes), to have (lunch, dinner, etc.), to eat
